attributes.action: disband cafcass due to non'impartial judgments in the family courts
attributes.additional_details: the results in family courts using cafcass for which judges are heavily bias in there judgments puts kids at risk and in the public opinion is a unfair trial via manipulative bias on the side of cafcass in order to sway the judges opinion so it is in the publics interest for cafcass to be disbanded completely for the sake of our children..
attributes.background: Cafcass needs to be 100% disbanded due to non'impartial judgments in the family courts.

rejection.details:
